# Interface TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface

Unified configuration interface that matches C++ TextEmbedderCreationConfig. Supports both local and remote embedder configurations.

interface TextEmbedderCreationConfigInterface {  
config:  
| [RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface](./primitives_embedder_config.RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface)  
| [LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface](./primitives_embedder_config.LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface);  
type: "local"  
| "remote";  
}

##### Index

### Properties

config type

## Properties

### config

config: [RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface](./primitives_embedder_config.RemoteTextEmbedderConfigInterface) | [LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface](./primitives_embedder_config.LocalTextEmbedderConfigInterface)

Configuration parameters for the embedder

### type

type: "local" | "remote"

Type of embedder configuration
